short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the colour of the text and background of a webpage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to apply any colour to fonts and backgrounds of any webpage. To use the extension click on the symbol and you will see a drop-down menu, this has three options - fonts, background and reset. Upon clicking either the font or background it will drop-down three sliders that represent the RGB values, move these sliders to change the font/background. The reset button will remove any changes made to the page (note: to do this it refreshes the page).
